languages.text: "Зачем мне лгать мон-кай? Твой разум слишком слаб даже для того, чтобы осознать, что перед тобой заключенная в клетку душа. Я не имею намерений вводить тебя в еще большее заблуждение".

traits.locale_text: "Зачем мне лгать мон-кай? Твой разум слишком слаб даже ждля того, чтобы осознать, что перед тобой заключенная в клетку душа. Я не имею намерений вводить тебя в еще большее заблюждение".
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "Why would I lie to a mon-keigh? Your feeble intelligence lacks even the capacity to realise you have a caged soul on your hands. I have no intention to further your delusions. You are steeped in them as it is."
languages.original_text: "Зачем мне лгать мон-кай? Твой разум слишком слаб даже для того, чтобы осознать, что перед тобой заключенная в клетку душа. Я не имею намерений вводить тебя в еще большее заблуждение".

traits.locale_text: "Why would I lie to a mon-keigh? Your feeble intelligence lacks even the capacity to realise you have a caged soul on your hands. I have no intention to further your delusions. You are steeped in them as it is."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

traits.locale_text: "Why would I lie to a mon-keigh? Your feeble intelligence lacks even the capacity to realise you have a caged soul on your hands. I have no intention to further your delusions. You are steeped in them as it is."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

traits.locale_text: "Why would I lie to a mon-keigh? Your feeble intelligence lacks even the capacity to realise you have a caged soul on your hands. I have no intention to further your delusions. You are steeped in them as it is."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

traits.locale_text: "Why would I lie to a mon-keigh? Your feeble intelligence lacks even the capacity to realise you have a caged soul on your hands. I have no intention to further your delusions. You are steeped in them as it is."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

traits.locale_text: "Why would I lie to a mon-keigh? Your feeble intelligence lacks even the capacity to realise you have a caged soul on your hands. I have no intention to further your delusions. You are steeped in them as it is."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: «¿Para qué iba yo a mentirle a {mf|un|una} mon-keigh? Tu patético intelecto ni siquiera es capaz de comprender que lo que sostienes en las manos es un alma enjaulada. No tengo intención de fomentar tus delirios; bastante creídos te los tienes ya».
languages.original_text: "Why would I lie to a mon-keigh? Your feeble intelligence lacks even the capacity to realise you have a caged soul on your hands. I have no intention to further your delusions. You are steeped in them as it is."

traits.locale_text: «¿Para qué iba yo a mentirle a {mf|un|una} mon-keigh? Tu patético intelecto ni siquiera es capaz de comprender que lo que sostienes en las manos es un alma enjaulada. No tengo intención de fomentar tus delirios; bastante creídos te los tienes ya».
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: 「なぜ私がモン＝ケイに嘘をつかねばならない？お前の貧弱な知性では、檻に入れられた魂が己の手に宿っていることにすら気づかないのだな。お前の妄想を助長するつもりはない。すでにお前はその妄想に浸っているからな」
languages.original_text: "Why would I lie to a mon-keigh? Your feeble intelligence lacks even the capacity to realise you have a caged soul on your hands. I have no intention to further your delusions. You are steeped in them as it is."

traits.locale_text: 「なぜ私がモン＝ケイに嘘をつかねばならない？お前の貧弱な知性では、檻に入れられた魂が己の手に宿っていることにすら気づかないのだな。お前の妄想を助長するつもりはない。すでにお前はその妄想に浸っているからな」
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: “我为什么要对猴子说谎？你那孱弱的智力甚至都意识不到你身上带着被囚禁的灵魂。我无意助长你的妄想，毕竟你已经深陷其中。”
languages.original_text: "Why would I lie to a mon-keigh? Your feeble intelligence lacks even the capacity to realise you have a caged soul on your hands. I have no intention to further your delusions. You are steeped in them as it is."

traits.locale_text: “我为什么要对猴子说谎？你那孱弱的智力甚至都意识不到你身上带着被囚禁的灵魂。我无意助长你的妄想，毕竟你已经深陷其中。”
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: « Pourquoi mentirais-je à {mf|un|une} mon-keigh ? Votre esprit est si faible qu'il ne vous permet même pas de réaliser que vous tenez entre vos mains une âme emprisonnée. Je n'ai aucune intention d'encourager vos illusions. Elles vous dominent déjà. »
languages.original_text: "Why would I lie to a mon-keigh? Your feeble intelligence lacks even the capacity to realise you have a caged soul on your hands. I have no intention to further your delusions. You are steeped in them as it is."

traits.locale_text: « Pourquoi mentirais-je à {mf|un|une} mon-keigh ? Votre esprit est si faible qu'il ne vous permet même pas de réaliser que vous tenez entre vos mains une âme emprisonnée. « Je n'ai aucune intention d'encourager vos illusions. Elles vous dominent déjà. »
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "Warum sollte ich {mf|einen|eine} Chem-Pan-Sey anlügen? Euer kümmerlicher Verstand ist einfach nicht dazu fähig zu erkennen, dass Ihr eine gefangene Seele in den Händen haltet. Ich habe nicht vor, Eure Wahnvorstellungen noch zu unterstützen. Ihr seid sowieso schon völlig von ihnen ergriffen."
languages.original_text: "Why would I lie to a mon-keigh? Your feeble intelligence lacks even the capacity to realise you have a caged soul on your hands. I have no intention to further your delusions. You are steeped in them as it is."

traits.locale_text: "Warum sollte ich {mf|einen|eine} Chem-Pan-Sey anlügen? Euer kümmerlicher Verstand ist einfach nicht dazu fähig zu erkennen, dass Ihr eine gefangene Seele in den Händen haltet. Ich habe nicht vor, Eure Wahnvorstellungen noch zu unterstützen. Ihr seid sowieso schon völlig von ihnen ergriffen."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "Neden bir mon-keigh'e yalan söyleyeyim? Hiç de parlak olmayan o zekân, karşısında kapatıldığı kafesten çıkmaya can atan bir ruh olduğunu fark etmekten yoksun. Baştan aşağı yanılgıya batmışsın, durumu daha da kötüleştirmek anlamsız."
languages.original_text: "Why would I lie to a mon-keigh? Your feeble intelligence lacks even the capacity to realise you have a caged soul on your hands. I have no intention to further your delusions. You are steeped in them as it is."

traits.locale_text: "Neden bir mon-keigh'e yalan söyleyeyim? Hiç de parlak olmayan o zekân, avuçlarının içinde kafese kapatılmış bir ruh olduğunu fark edebilmekten bile yoksun. Yanılgılarını daha da artırmaya niyetim yok. Onlara baştan aşağı batmışsın zaten."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer
